BERGDAHL. THERE IS ENOUGH EVIDENCE TO

GROUP. IT’S A PRIVATE INTELLIGENCE
FIRM RETAINED BY THE PENTAGON AS A SUBCONTRACTOR

THEIR SITUATION REPORTS
